amendment.description: Amendment added additional requirements to the Presidential reporting provisions contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the administration to report to Congress on efforts to internationalize the military operations and reconstruction of Iraq.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoeffel amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Hoeffel.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hoeffel amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
